name: SmallBusinessVoice

skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: We recognize many of you need immediate assistance and are looking for help in answering questions. We are here to connect you to experts, coaches and consultants to help you find relief and long-term restoration to rebuild the business or nonprofit you have worked so hard for.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
